meanings.definition: A person who solves or explains riddles.
meanings.sent1: The unriddlers at the party quickly guessed the answer to the tricky question.
meanings.sent2: The unriddlers in the group were able to crack the mystery in no time.
meanings.sent3: The unriddlers chuckled as they effortlessly deciphered the tricky puzzle.
meanings.sent4: She was like an unriddler, unraveling the secrets of the ancient text with ease.
meanings.sent5: The unriddlers' talent for unraveling enigmas amazed everyone at the event.

meanings.definition: Those who provide solutions to puzzles or mysteries.
meanings.sent1: The unriddlers shared their insights on the cryptic message, helping us understand it better.
meanings.sent2: We turned to the unriddlers for help when we couldn't figure out the hidden clues.
meanings.sent3: The unriddlers jokingly offered to solve the case of the missing cookies in record time.
meanings.sent4: Their team worked together like a group of unriddlers, unlocking the secrets of the ancient artifact.
meanings.sent5: The unriddlers' ability to unravel complex problems made them invaluable in the investigation.
